name: PAUL LEE
innerText: Recently visited in dental check. The entire process from check in to the end was seamless. The staff at the dental check department was courteous and helpful. I would highly recommend this hospital to anyone looking for something similar services.

name: ANN CLARK
innerText: I met Dr Emma last month with severe cough and sputum for my father Dr Smith. His way of handling patients is excellent and so soothing that the patient feels immensely confident about recovery. Thanks to Dr. Vijay, within 2 weeks, he is completely normal.

name: Mark Wood
innerText: In Dental Care hospital Dr. Alan Anderson at reception people Mr.Venkat helping to patients excelent way of speaking Guidense.. I felt very Happy with this people... I strongly recommend to my Friends n Relatives and everyone to this Dental Care Hospital

name: ANN CLARK
innerText: Dr. Shree kumar Reddy is very experienced dental surgeon doctor in the world. I have been consulting him for 10+ years for me, family and my Friends. He did dental surgery for my mother and now she can see like a normal person. Thank You very much Doctor.
